title: Magic Pants
description: A man and woman are sitting together outdoors next to a tree. The man is wearing a purple shirt and brightly patterned pants, while the woman is dressed in a sleeveless white dress. They appear to be sitting on a grassy area near a road with a parked car visible behind them. The background includes green foliage and glimpses of a distant pond or body of water. The table in front of them has some glassware and a bowl. The pants are awesome.
